title: Can I know why I haven't gotten feedback on reporting this guy?
body: This guy was toxic and in all caps from the start and then rage quit because I, as his support, accidentally took a minion? He AFK'd and left the game in a fit of rage after flaming and being toxic, but yet I haven't gotten feedback for him being punished?
